statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyData
SELECT location, energy_consumption FROM EnergyData
SELECT date, time, energy_consumption FROM EnergyData WHERE energy_generation > 0
SELECT * FROM EnergyData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyData
SELECT * FROM EnergyData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyData GROUP BY location HAVING total_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT location, energy_generation * 1.25 AS adjusted_generation FROM EnergyData WHERE energy_generation > 500 ORDER BY adjusted_generation DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(energy_consumption) AS average_consumption FROM EnergyData WHERE location = 'California' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT location, energy_consumption, energy_generation, (energy_consumption - energy_generation) AS net_consumption FROM EnergyData WHERE location = 'Texas' ORDER BY net_consumption ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, consumption_kWh FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT SUM(consumption_kWh) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT location, generation_kWh FROM energy_generation WHERE generation_kWh > 100 ORDER BY generation_kWh DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT location, SUM(consumption_kWh) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(consumption_kWh) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY location HAVING avg_consumption > 100;

SELECT ec.location, ec.consumption_kWh, eg.generation_kWh, ec.date, ec.time FROM energy_consumption ec INNER JOIN energy_generation eg ON ec.date = eg.date AND ec.time = eg.time WHERE ec.location = 'California';

SELECT date, location, SUM(consumption_kWh) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' GROUP BY date, location ORDER BY date ASC, total_consumption DESC;
SELECT id, date, time, location, consumption FROM energy_consumption
SELECT location, consumption, date, time, id FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_generation WHERE generation > 500 ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC
SELECT id, date, location, generation FROM energy_generation WHERE location='Office' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT date, consumption, generation, trend FROM energy_trends WHERE generation < consumption
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT location, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT date, location, generation FROM energy_generation WHERE generation > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, location ASC;
SELECT date, trend, AVG(consumption) AS average_consumption, AVG(generation) AS average_generation FROM energy_trends WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY date, trend;

SELECT location, MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption, MIN(generation) AS min_generation FROM energy_consumption JOIN energy_generation ON energy_consumption.location = energy_generation.location GROUP BY location ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT location, consumption_kwh, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_kwh > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM energy_generation ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_name, type, capacity_kwh FROM energy_sources WHERE type = 'solar';
SELECT * FROM energy_trends WHERE value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, consumption_kwh FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_kwh > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_generation WHERE location='California' ORDER BY generation_kwh DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT AVG(consumption_kwh) AS avg_consumption, MAX(consumption_kwh) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption;

SELECT energy_trends.timestamp, energy_trends.trend_type, energy_sources.source_name FROM energy_trends JOIN energy_sources ON energy_trends.id = energy_sources.id WHERE energy_sources.type = 'Solar' ORDER BY energy_trends.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT location, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT location, energy_generated FROM energy_generation WHERE location='New York';
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT location, time_period, trends FROM energy_analysis ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT location, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_generation WHERE energy_generated > 100 ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 25 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT MAX(energy_generated) AS max_energy_generated, AVG(energy_generated) AS avg_energy_generated FROM energy_generation;
